title: Theresa Tam says reason for 'cautious optimism' as epidemic growth rate slows - The Globe and Mail
description: She cautioned, though, that while everyone is hoping for a sprint to the finish, preventing the spread of COVID-19 is a marathon, and that ‘there are no rewards for quitting early’
content:
Chief Public Health Officer Theresa Tam, seen here on April 15, 2020, explained that she is citing data at the national level, meaning a composite of many epidemics across the country. 
Adrian Wyld/The Canadian Press
Physical distancing measures are working… [+3706 chars]
